subject: Football
Arena Football
lead_paragraph: Matt D’Orazio threw seven touchdown passes and ran for another score as the Philadelphia Soul defeated the defending Arena Football League champion, San Jose, 59-56, in New Orleans on Sunday to win its first Arena Bowl title.
snippet: Matt D’Orazio threw seven touchdown passes and ran for another score as the Philadelphia Soul defeated the defending Arena Football League champion, San Jose, 59-56, in New Orleans on Sunday to win its first Arena Bowl title.
